betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The effects of distortions, no matter how much they are suppressed, will one day not be able to be sustained for long, and how to eradicate distortions will be explained here. 

You need to make Exorcism Soap, which will allow you to remove all of your temporary distortions and some of your normal distortions. 

Wanting it to clear the temporary distortions is easy, you just need to keep rubbing the soap. 
But to get it to clear normal distortions, you'll need to combine it with Purifying Bath Salts and Water of Purification. 

When you have the Distortion Guard Buff, using the soap will give you a chance to wash away 0~1 points of Normal Distortion. 
When you're soaking inside the Water of Purification, using the Exorcism Soap will give you a higher probability of washing away 1~2 points of Normal Distortion. 
For permanent distortions, I'm sorry, but this soap can't do anything about them.
